commit message: Fix NullPointerException when exiting starred activity
Fix NullPointerException if the service is being restarted after its process has gone away
Set update dialogs as not cancellable.
Fix issue at the end of UpdateActivity to restart app
Specify in Manifest not to do anything when orientation change (not to fix any issue, just to make it smoother)
Set default project encoding as UTF-8
Change way to check for updates (once every 14 days)
Disable proguard to help me understand stacktrace more easily if an error is reported
Let Android handle plural form for Meaning(s) in WordMeaningActivity.
